name: Bughouse Chess Timer
description:
Bughouse is an easy-to-use game timer for Bughouse Chess or any other game that is played in teams of 2 vs 2 with separate boards. It is 2 chess clocks in one app! Team up with a friend, challenge two other friends (?), put the iPhone or iPad between your chess boards and engage in the spectacular game of Bughouse chess.

Features: Play time 1 - 10 minutes per player, or you can choose the special "Team time" variant where teammates share the time.

Note that this app only provides the timers. You will still need physical chess boards and pieces!
